local_testimonials.name: Katherine Sullivan
local_testimonials.quote: Our Canton Street shop gets tourists and locals calling about inventory constantly. Voice AI handles 200+ inquiries monthly while I help in-store customers. Sales increased 67% and I've shipped to 14 states. Historic Roswell businesses need this technology.

local_testimonials.name: Brian Foster
local_testimonials.quote: Our restaurant near the Roswell Mill is always packed. Voice AI handles 450 reservation calls monthly and reduced no-shows by 34% with confirmations. Revenue up $123,000 this year. The historic district foot traffic combined with AI bookings is perfect.

local_testimonials.name: Dr. Michelle Park
local_testimonials.quote: East Roswell families expect availability when their kids get sick at 2 AM. Voice AI triages calls, books urgent appointments, and routes emergencies. Patient satisfaction jumped 89% and we've added 234 new family patients. Essential for Roswell healthcare.
